EmailTemplate.name: SFDC Sandbox Refresh Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: ** REMINDER ** UTQA Sandbox Refresh October 19, 2012
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
TO: SFDC Corporate Org Administrators / Engagement Leaders
To allow for testing & preparation for project deployments, the full copy DuPont Utilities QA (UTQA) Sandbox is being refreshed.
Sandbox Refresh Notice Force.com Sandbox: UTQA (full copy â€“ DuPont UtilitiesOrg) Start Refresh Copy: After ~5:00 PM ET Friday October 19, 2012
Activating a refreshed sandbox replaces the existing sandbox with the refreshed version. This permanently deletes the existing version and all data. The Sandbox may be unavailable for use during the refresh period. A notice will be forwarded when the refresh copy is activated.
What you need to do: Please work with SFDC Admin Support to insure any configuration or customizations in progress have been saved, or backed up in another Org before the refresh begins.
More Information: Sandbox Refresh Schedule featured in CRM Content (subscribe to receive notification of updates): https://one-dupont.my.salesforce.com/sfc/#version?id=06830000000aAS5
